es.uco.pw.business.managers

Class AssistantManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uco.pw.business.managers.AssistantManager

  • public class AssistantManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages operations related to assistants in the system, such as registration, search, modification, and printing.

      • modify

        public void modify(int id,
                   java.lang.String newname,
                   java.lang.String newsurname,
                   java.time.LocalDate newdate,
                   boolean newatention)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Modifies the details of an existing assistant in the system.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the assistant to be modified.
        newname - The new name of the assistant.
        newsurname - The new surname of the assistant.
        newdate - The new date of birth of the assistant.
        newatention - The new attention status of the assistant.
        list - The list of assistants in the system.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
